ceterms:description: To become licensed as a Registered Occupational Therapist (OTR), you are required to have a Master’s Degree from an approved occupational therapy program.  IUPUI and USI offer these programs.  Our program is closely aligned with both IUPUI and USI’s Bachelor’s Degree requirements.  You would complete your first two years of courses at Vincennes University, transfer and complete your Bachelor’s Degree, and then apply to IUPUI or USI.
ceterms:name: A.S. in Pre-Occupational Therapy
